# @liquify/testae

Various utilities and wrappers for running tests with [avajs](#) in the [Liquify](#) IDE plugin monorepo. Facilitates automation and fixture generation.

## Why?

Liquify leverages [avajs](#) for test related operations. This module helps to bring a little more sanity to test files in the Liquify monorepo and all packages relating to the project.

## Install

```cli
<pnpm|npm|yarn> i @liquify/testae --save-dev
```

## Usage

```js
import { fixture, tests } from "@liquify/testae";
```

## Contributing

This package is licensed under MIT but it exists as part of a monorepo that is closed source. Currently, any contributions, issues and/or feature requests by end users is not possible.
